headline: ICE Launches TTF Daily Options and Announces Record Trading Across TTF and JKM Natural Gas
summary: AMSTERDAM & LONDON, December 15, 2025--Intercontinental Exchange, Inc. (NYSE:ICE), a leading global provider of technology and data and home to the largest markets in the world to trade energy derivatives, today announced the launch of TTF Daily Options, as well as record trading through 2025 across ICE’s TTF futures and options markets, including TTF 1st Line Financial futures, as well as JKM LNG (Platts) natural gas futures.
